description: Third (unsigned) column sequence of triangle A062140 (generalized a=4 Laguerre).
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=0,...,100
Index entries for sequences related to Laguerre polynomials
formula: E.g.f.: (1+12*x+15*x^2)/(1-x)^9.a(n)=A062140(n+2, 2) = (n+2)!*binomial(n+6, 6)/2!.If we define f(n,i,x)= sum(sum(binomial(k,j)*stirling1(n,k)*stirling2(j,i)*x^(k-j),j=i..k),k=i..n) then a(n-2)=(-1)^n*f(n,2,-7), (n>=2). [From _Milan Janjic_, Mar 01 2009]a(n) = C(n,6)*(n-4)!/2 , n>=6 . [From _Zerinvary Lajos_, Jul 07 2009]
maple: a:=n->sum((n-j)*n!/6!, j=5..n): seq(a(n), n=6..21); - _Zerinvary Lajos_, Apr 29 2007
prog: (Sage) [binomial(n,6)*factorial (n-4)/2 for n in xrange(6, 22)] # [From _Zerinvary Lajos_, Jul 07 2009](PARI) { f=1; for (n=0, 100, f*=n + 2; write("b062260.txt", n, " ", f*binomial(n + 6, 6)/2) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 03 2009]
author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Jun 19 2001
